item.description:
Welcome Back. Discussion topic. Interdependence and Gratitude. Includes the annual Water Ceremony. Please bring a vial of water from a location visited over the summer (it can be tap too that symbolizes the place) that represents an experience of either inner interconnectedness or deep gratitude to Life. All water vials will be poured into a larger vase that represents the Oneness of Reality.

See our CALENDAR @

www.bffct.net
item.how_to_find_us: Mansfield Freeman Center is towards the end of the road next to cementery.

group.name: Buddhist Faith Fellowship in Middletown, Ct

item.name: Interdependence and Gratitude
